description_: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
Delicious French dessert consisting of rich custard topped with caramelized sugar.
Authentic Mexican street food made with marinated pork cooked on a vertical rotisserie.
Popular Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, seafood, and vegetables rolled in seaweed.
Classic American dessert with a rich and creamy cheesecake filling on a graham cracker crust.
Traditional Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, eggs, and peanuts in a tangy sauce.
Famous Spanish rice dish cooked with saffron, seafood, chicken, and vegetables.
Popular Indian curry dish with tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
Classic Greek dish made with layers of eggplant, potatoes, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.
Chinese dumplings filled with ground pork, cabbage, and spices, served with dipping sauce.
A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
A popular Indian dish consisting of marinated and grilled chicken pieces served in a spiced tomato-based curry sauce.
A rich and creamy French dessert made with a smooth custard base topped with a layer of caramelized sugar.
Traditional Mexican dish made with corn tortillas filled with seasoned chicken, cheese, and topped with enchilada sauce.
A classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.
A popular Thai street food dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, tofu, shrimp, and a tangy sauce.
Fresh and flavorful Mexican dip made with mashed avocado, lime juice, tomatoes, onions, and cilantro.

Rolled sushi made with vinegared rice, fish, and vegetables, often served with soy sauce and wasabi.
A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

A North Indian dish made with spinach (palak) and paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a spiced creamy sauce.
A spicy and sour Thai soup made with shrimp, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, and chili peppers.

Traditional Mexican dish consisting of roasted poblano peppers stuffed with cheese, then battered and fried.

Classic Italian appetizer made with toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
Creamy Indian curry made with tender chicken pieces cooked in a spinach-based sauce flavored with spices.
A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with wide rice noodles, Chinese broccoli, eggs, and a savory sauce.
A classic French dish of chicken braised with wine, mushrooms, onions, and bacon.
Classic Italian pasta dish made with layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese.
Spicy Thai curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, vegetables, and choice of meat.

Indian curry dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a spiced tomato-based sauce with butter and cream.
French upside-down pastry with caramelized fruit (usually apples) topped with pastry and baked until golden.

Spicy Thai curry made with red curry paste, coconut milk, vegetables, and choice of meat.
Sicilian eggplant dish consisting of cooked vegetables, tomatoes, olives, and capers, often served as a side dish or relish.

Indian dish of chicken marinated in a mixture of yogurt and spices, then grilled or roasted.

Sicilian pastry consisting of tube-shaped shells of fried pastry dough filled with a sweet, creamy filling containing ricotta.

Traditional Provençal fish stew originating from the port city of Marseille, usually made with various types of fish and shellfish.

Japanese dish of lightly battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables.
Traditional Mexican dish consisting of poblano peppers stuffed with a mixture of meat, fruits, and spices, topped with walnut cream sauce and pomegranate seeds.

Classic French dish of chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and bacon.

Italian salad made with stale bread, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, basil, and a vinaigrette dressing.
Japanese pork and vegetable soup flavored with miso paste, often containing ingredients like pork belly, daikon radish, and potatoes.

Grilled corn on the cob slathered with mayonnaise, chili powder, cotija cheese, and a squeeze of lime juice.
Sicilian pastry consisting of tube-shaped shells of fried pastry dough filled with a sweet, creamy filling containing ricotta cheese.
Provençal French vegetable stew dish made with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, tomatoes, onions, and various herbs.
Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with wide rice noodles, meat (such as chicken, beef, or shrimp), Thai basil, chili peppers, and soy sauce.
Italian salad made with stale bread, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, basil, and a vinaigrette dressing.
Japanese skewered chicken grilled over charcoal, typically seasoned with salt or a sweet-savory sauce called tare.

Italian vegetable soup made with a variety of vegetables, beans, and pasta or rice, simmered in a tomato-based broth.
Japanese savory pancake containing a variety of ingredients, usually including cabbage, meat, and seafood, topped with okonomiyaki sauce and mayonnaise.
Traditional Mexican street food tacos made with slow-cooked pork (carnitas), served with chopped onions, cilantro, salsa, and lime wedges.
Simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar.
Traditional French soup made with caramelized onions, beef broth, toasted bread, and melted cheese on top.
Thai stir-fry dish made with chicken, cashew nuts, vegetables, and a savory sauce, served over rice.
Italian salad made with stale bread, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, basil, and a vinaigrette dressing.
Japanese snack made of battered and grilled octopus balls, typically filled with pieces of octopus, tempura scraps, pickled ginger, and green onion.
Traditional Mexican soup made with hominy, pork or chicken, and seasoned with chili peppers, garlic, and other spices.
Classic Italian appetizer made with toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
French dish of sliced potatoes baked in milk, cream, and garlic, topped with cheese and breadcrumbs, then baked until golden and bubbly.
Thai curry dish made with green curry paste, coconut milk, vegetables, and choice of meat.
Simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar.
